article: u.s. secretary of state hillary rodham clinton on tuesday called the proposed new u.n. sanctions against iran 's suspect nuclear program the toughest ever , a day before the u.n. security council was expected to vote on the measure .
abstract: clinton iran sanctions will be toughest ever
